other_tests.findings: Homozygosity of SLC18A3 c.1078G.C, p.Gly360Arg was revealed in the affected brothers but not in other family members.
Normal at first, brain atrophy was first noted.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Structural changes noted as brain atrophy progressed over time.

other_tests.findings: Delayed myelination with normal size and structure of ventricles and corpus callosum.
Hearing thresholds of 60 and 80 dB in the right and left ears, respectively; prolonged absolute latencies and interpeak interval latencies for waves I to VI.
Undetectable levels of the mutant VAChT protein in the stably transfected lines.
